title: The Amazing newborn
creator_credit: Maureen Hack and Patricia E Rambasek
brief_description: Shows how normal infants aged 1-7 days can see and have visual preferences, turn their heads in response to spoken words, mimic and move in rhythm to parental voices. It also shows the six states of consciousness first observed by Peter Wolff.
